title: OPL Grand Final @ Luna Park Sydney + HOYTS Viewing Party Part 2

embed.description: Hey everyone, It's less than a month until the OPL Grand Final at Luna Park! Below you can find all the information you need to plan your day. Watching from home The finals will be streamed live at www.twitch.tv/riotgamesoceania from 16:55 AEST on Saturday August 8.

body:
If you have questions about the HOYTS viewing parties or the Luna Park Sydney event post them here!

Old post: http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/announcements/w4RGfI8N-league-of-legends-live-community-event-opl-grand-final-luna-park-qa

replies.body: For worlds could a theater closer towards the city be used? I live on the opposite side  and it would be cool if I didn't have to travel to the middle of woop woop

> [{quoted}](name=SaltedFriedEggs,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=FA3PYF9I,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-07-14T02:12:40.977+0000)
>
> For worlds could a theater closer towards the city be used? I live on the opposite side  and it would be cool if I didn't have to travel to the middle of woop woop

WOW! Sucks to be you in that sense.  I would have to travel to another island (North Island in NZ) to get there. Oh but wait its sold out! So uh a trip to Aussie on the cards maybe... lol sigh. 
Any chance in future they would look at Christchurch as well for NZ Sephyre??
All great points guys and for the up and coming events we will look at the OPL and decide what is the best approach to widen the viewing experience.
@Sephyre Is there anything being displayed in Christchurch?
Sorry for the OPL we wanted to test this concept, so going forward for other events we will keep the South Island in mind.
Will something be released in the store to commemorate the event (riot skins etc), sorta like what you do with worlds and the CS skins?
Hi, no there is nothing planned for the store for the OPL Final, great idea though!
Will see if I can get a leave pass lol.
